title: WebRTC voice/video calling system
description: Implement peer-to-peer voice and video calling using WebRTC with Nostr for signaling. Exchange SDP offers/answers and ICE candidates through Nostr events.

title: Nostr signaling for WebRTC
description: Create custom Nostr event kinds for WebRTC signaling: SDP offer/answer exchange, ICE candidate sharing. Use p-tags for targeted peer communication.

title: Improve relay connection resilience
description: Add better reconnection logic, relay health monitoring, and fallback relay support. Consider adding relay discovery.

title: Global activity view - see users across all URLs
description: Subscribe to all presence events globally (not just current channel). Show a view of which URLs have active users. Enables discovery of where people are chatting.

title: Fix onboarding flow: key-first instead of display name
description: Change setup screen to ask for Nostr public key OR generate new keypair. Display name should be secondary/optional. Support importing existing keys.

title: WebRTC peer connection manager
description: Build RTCPeerConnection wrapper for managing audio/video streams, handling connection state, and media device access.

title: Message encryption with NIP-04
description: Implement NIP-04 encrypted direct messages for private chats. Use shared secret from ECDH for AES encryption.

title: NIP-07 browser extension wallet support
description: Add support for NIP-07 compatible browser extensions (nos2x, Alby) to use existing Nostr identities instead of generating new keys.

title: Replace expired relay.nostr.band certificate
description: Replaced relay.nostr.band (SSL cert expired causing ERR_CERT_DATE_INVALID) with relay.primal.net

title: Fix null publicKey crash on popup load
description: Fixed TypeError in announcePresence when publicKey was null. Added null check and fixed initClient to not return uninitialized client.

title: Fix BIP340 Schnorr signature implementation
description: Fixed Nostr event signature verification failures. Implemented proper BIP340 tagged hashes (BIP0340/aux, BIP0340/nonce, BIP0340/challenge), handle private key negation when public key y-coordinate is odd.

title: Auto-join channels and show badge notifications
description: Auto-join channel when browsing (passive listening). Show badge on extension icon with unread message count. Remove confusing Join button - just be in the channel automatically.

title: Voice/video call UI components
description: Add call controls UI: mute/unmute, video on/off, end call. Display remote video stream and local preview.
